titles.title: A joint resolution to designate January 4, 1989, as "National Commissioned Corps of the Public Health Service Centennial Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/4/1988--Introduced. Designates January 4, 1989, as National Commissioned Corps of the Public Health Service Centennial Day.
